abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project consists of the
            following elements: (a) expansion of the Santa isabel
            hydroelectric power station, including a third unit (18 MW)
            and the installation of a second penstock; (b) construction
            of a compensating pond with a capacity of 100,000
